roleset.name: loom
roleset.note: BULK-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from bulk.01-v)

example.name: unergative
example.text: It bulks under a veil of thin , new grass , like some embarrassing fact ofphysicalness , and I think [0] Mrs. Pastern set out the statuary [*]to softenits meaning .
example.arg: under a veil of thin , new grass
like some embarrassing fact of physicalness

role.descr: what arg1 is full of, creating bulkiness

example.name: both args
example.text: Placenta of 20 × 16 × 2 cm, weighing 720 g, was bulky with grape like vesicles involving whole placenta.
example.arg: with grape like vesicles involving whole placenta.
